short_summary: Purchase Cryogenic RF Probe Station Operating up to 67GHz for Radio Astronomy Instrumentation.).
description: The Herzberg Astronomy and Astrophysics Research Centre (HAA) located in Victoria, has a need for one (1) cryogenic RF probe station.
full_summary:
## 31034-234243_B Cryogenic Probe Station Tender Notice
#### Notification Period: July 24, 2023 - August 23, 2023, 14:00:00

**Tender Reference:** WS3773861970; **Modification Number:** 2

**Procurement Summary:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the National Research Council of Canada (NRC), invites interested suppliers to submit tenders for the procurement of one (1) cryogenic RF probe station operating up to at least 67 GHz. The procurement is subject to Open Bidding (Competitive) and the lowest bidder will be selected based on lowest price.

**Scope of Work:**
The successful supplier will be required to provide a cryogenic RF probe station used in the development of high-sensitivity and low noise devices for radio astronomy instrumentation at the Herzberg Astronomy and Astrophysics Research Centre (HAA), NRC, in Victoria, British Columbia.

**Key Requirements:**

| **Parameter** | **Description** | **Requirements** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Operating Frequency | RF probe station operating frequency | Up to at least 67 GHz |

**Notice Details:**

| **Parameter** | **Description** | **Value** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Contracting Entity Name | Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) |  |
| Notice Type | Request for Proposal |  |
| Procurement Category | Goods |  |
| Procurement Method | Competitive - Open Bidding |  |
| Regions of Delivery | British Columbia |  |
| Regions of Opportunity | None |  |
| Trade Agreements | Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), and many others |  |
| Tender Status | Expired |  |

**Contractual Conditions:**

* The expected start date for the contract is not specified.
* The expected completion date for the contract is March 31, 2025.
* This tender is subject to all applicable laws and regulations.
* The successful supplier is responsible for providing a high-quality cryogenic RF probe station in accordance with the specifications provided.

For more details and to submit a tender, please refer to the official notice on the Ariba Discovery website at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16959911?extsite=MTY5NTk5MTFfQU4wMTQ4N
